translation.en: That's good. Step, drop. Back the other way. Step, drop.

translation.en: And s-- Oh!
translation.ja: ドロップ…

translation.en: Shit!
translation.ja: クソっ

translation.en: - Are you okay? -
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm fine.
translation.ja: 何ともない

translation.en: May I?
translation.ja: 見せて

translation.en: I read about acupressure for your knee injury, and these points were recommended.

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Thank you… for the dance lesson.
translation.ja: レッスン ありがとう

translation.en: Yeah, good. Your foot is comfortable,

translation.en: and your seat belt is on. Did you check your mirror?

translation.en: - What do you see? - Uh… a tree?

translation.en: Good job. Slow down.

translation.en: So I took on a new extracurricular.
translation.ja: 部活を始めた

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What is it?
translation.ja: 何の？

translation.en: - Dance team. - Dance team?
translation.ja: ダンスチーム

translation.en: That sounds fun. It also sounds very time- consuming.
translation.ja: 楽しそう でも時間を食う

translation.en: Well, Einstein said, Time is an illusion.
translation.ja: “時間は幻想”だって

translation.en: Well, Einstein also said, Worry about your GPA.
translation.ja: 評定平均値は現実よ

translation.en: - That's a good one. - Okay, slow down.
translation.ja: そうか 速度を落として その調子よ

translation.en: Yeah, keep it slow. Good job.
translation.ja: 速度を落として その調子よ

translation.en: So, um, you think I'm ready to leave the parking lot yet?
translation.ja: 路上練習はいつから？

translation.en: Definitely not. At least another week.
translation.ja: あと１週間はムリ

translation.en: - You said that last week. - Okay.
translation.ja: 先週もそう言った

translation.en: You are so lucky you missed. Do it again, though. I dare you.

translation.en: Eat me.
translation.ja: ざまみろ

translation.en: Kids are disgusting.
translation.ja: くそガキ

translation.en: Okay, everybody.
translation.ja: さあ みんな

translation.en: You have each been chosen to be part of a brand- new dance crew.
translation.ja: 新ダンスチームの メンバーに選ばれたのよ

translation.en: Name TBD.
translation.ja: チーム名はＴＢＤ

translation.en: What is TBD?
translation.ja: 何それ？

translation.en: It stands for to be determined.
translation.ja: “未定”って意味の頭文字よ

translation.en: - That's not our real name. It's just-- - The flyer said there would be snacks.
translation.ja: “未定”って意味の頭文字よ 軽食はどこ？

translation.en: Which are also TBD as of right now.
translation.ja: それも今は“未定(ＴＢＤ)”よ

translation.en: Okay. Tapes? - You're doing our music. - Dope.

translation.en: Raven, you're doing our costumes.
translation.ja: レイヴンは衣装係

translation.en: How do you guys feel about dead cheerleaders?
translation.ja: ゾンビの衣装はどう？

translation.en: - Quinn, you're doing our costumes. - I can do that.
translation.ja: クイン 衣装係やって

translation.en: It says here choreographer, and then it's blank.
translation.ja: 振付師が空白だ

translation.en: Okay, um… might as well get into it.
translation.ja: じゃあ 説明するね

translation.en: I'm going to get... Jake Taylor to be our choreographer.
translation.ja: ジェイク･テイラーに お願いするわ

translation.en: - Didn't he die? - No. Here I am, alive and well.
translation.ja: 故人の？ 生きてる

translation.en: Look, um, I'm not gonna waste my time and name if you end up sucking, but I will make you a deal, okay?
translation.ja: なにしろ多忙な身なんでね 提案があるんだ

translation.en: If you guys can make it past qualifiers on your own… I'll choreograph for you.
translation.ja: 自力で予選を通過できたら 振付師をやろう

translation.en: And if you need a place to rehearse for now, you can come to my studio.
translation.ja: 僕のスタジオで 練習してもいい

translation.en: As long as my boss isn't around, then you can do your thing there for free.
translation.ja: 上司にバレなきゃ 無料で使える

translation.en: Wow, okay. Quick question.
translation.ja: 聞いてもいい？

translation.en: So, you drove all the way here
translation.ja: それを言いに わざわざ来たの？

translation.en: just to tell us that you weren't going to waste your time on us?
translation.ja: それを言いに わざわざ来たの？ 多忙なのに？

translation.en: Yeah, well, I- I wasn't doing anything right now. That's why… I could come.
translation.ja: たまたま 体が空いてたんだよ

translation.en: But generally, I stay pretty busy. We'll just drop it.
translation.ja: 通常は忙しいんだけどね

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna go.
translation.ja: じゃあな

translation.en: But...
translation.ja: 来るなら 営業終了後に

translation.en: uh, yeah, the studio-- Just come around back when we close.
translation.ja: 来るなら 営業終了後に 裏口から入って

translation.en: I have no clue. Roman left his shoes again, so…
translation.ja: 忘れ物をした子がいて…

translation.en: - Figure it out. - Figure that out. Okay, bye.
translation.ja: お先に おつかれさまです

translation.en: Oops, my shoe.
translation.ja: 靴が

translation.en: What are we doing here?
translation.ja: ここは？

translation.en: What? I need a new mattress.
translation.ja: 新しいマットレスが欲しいの

translation.en: I think it could add a nice little feng shui.
translation.ja: おすすめですよ

translation.en: Oh, that mattress.
translation.ja: 彼のことね

translation.en: - You need to get some game, Quinn. - What do you mean by that?
translation.ja: あんたも恋しなよ 何よ

translation.en: You think I don't see you staring at Jake like he's a pop quiz?
translation.ja: ジェイクが好きでしょ

translation.en: - Untrue. - You just need to ask him out.
translation.ja: まさか 告白しな

translation.en: - I don't even know how to do that. - It's easy!
translation.ja: どうやって？ そんなの簡単よ

translation.en: Just play it cool.
translation.ja: そんなの簡単よ

translation.en: Like, check this out.
translation.ja: こんなふうに

translation.en: - Hi. - Oh my God.
translation.ja: 勘弁して

translation.en: I'll circle around and be with you in a few minutes.
translation.ja: では ごゆっくり

translation.en: Hey. Sorry about the wait. H- How can I help you guys?
translation.ja: お待たせして すみません

translation.en: Hi there. I am uh… looking for a new mattress.
translation.ja: いいマットレスあります？

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.ja: もちろんですよ

translation.en: - Well, you came to the right place. - I did, didn't I?
translation.ja: もちろんですよ ぜひ見せてちょうだい

translation.en: - Must be Mr. Right. -
translation.ja: ぜひ見せてちょうだい

translation.en: So, what are you thinking about,
translation.ja: 硬さのお好みは？

translation.en: - in terms of firmness? - So many things.
translation.ja: 硬さのお好みは？ 当ててみて

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.ja: 何これ

translation.en: Would you mind? I wanna test the spoon- worthiness - of this mattress. - Um…
translation.ja: カップル用にどうか 寝心地を試してみたい

translation.en: My friend here will move out of the way. Quinn?
translation.ja: カップル用にどうか 寝心地を試してみたい 早く どいて

translation.en: Why don't you just plop on down?
translation.ja: 横になって

translation.en: - Just a tad. - Yeah, okay. Sure, all right.
translation.ja: いいでしょう

translation.en: This is how this works. - Okay. This is… - This is good.
translation.ja: 協力しましょう まずは…

translation.en: - The firmness is… - The firmness of the bed is good. Yeah.
translation.ja: 硬さを ベッドの硬さはいい

translation.en: Firmness of the bed.
translation.ja: ベッドの硬さはいい

translation.en: I can't say I've done this before.
translation.ja: こんなの初めて

translation.en: This is a full experience.
translation.ja: すごくいいわ

translation.en: You know, we still need a name.

translation.en: I think we should name the team Jasss, with three S's.
translation.ja: ”ジャス(Jasss)”にしよう Ｓは３つよ

translation.en: We're not naming the team after you.
translation.ja: 自分の名前じゃない

translation.en: It's not after me.
translation.ja: 違うの

translation.en: It's like Yas, queen,
translation.ja: ”ヤース クイーン(まあ　すてき)”よ

translation.en: but like Jasss Quinn. It's cute, right?
translation.ja: “ジャスとクイン”で

translation.en: - What about The Raptures? - The Raptors are already a team, dummy.
translation.ja: “ラプチャーズ”は？ “ラプターズ”は使われてる

translation.en: No. Like, the Rapture?
translation.ja: “昇天(ラプチャー)”よ

translation.en: It's like… It's like when people get sucked up into the sky, and the world's about to end. Like, it's really cool.
translation.ja: 人間が空に吸い込まれていく 世紀末のイメージなの

translation.en: And all hell breaks loose on Earth, and, like--
translation.ja: 世界が地獄になる

translation.en: Okay, guys, we need to perform in front of a live audience before qualifiers.

translation.en: That's true. The Birds practice all the time at pep rallies.

translation.en: But who are we gonna perform for?
translation.ja: 観客はどこに？

translation.en: We have our audience!
translation.ja: 観客を連れてきたわ

translation.en: So this is it?
They're screening Fifty Shades of Grey in the media room.
translation.ja: 皆 官能映画を観てる

translation.en: But I got Harold.
translation.ja: ハロルド以外は

translation.en: 'Sup, Harold? You didn't wanna watch Fifty Shades of Grey?

translation.en: - No, he's not allowed to watch it anymore. - Oh.
translation.ja: 禁止されてるの

translation.en: Not after what happened last time. Right, Harold?
translation.ja: 前回 事故があって

translation.en: Okay, come on guys! Let's do this.
translation.ja: さあ やるわよ

translation.en: What happened last time?

translation.en: Did he just fall asleep to Big Freedia?

translation.en: No… No, he's-- Harold?
translation.ja: まさか そんなはず

translation.en: Harold, did you-- Did you like it?

translation.en: Pretty sure the key to a live audience is keeping them alive.

translation.en: Poor Harold.

translation.en: Why? Death comes to us all.

translation.en: Quinn, our terrible dancing just killed a man.

translation.en: All right? The sooner we face that fact, the sooner we can ask for forgiveness and move on with our lives.

translation.en: Well, then we need to work harder. - - Come on. Let's go.

translation.en: Okay. Hey, Tapes? Would you mind playing a beat?

translation.en: Why don't we get up and try a freestyle? We loosen up a little bit.

translation.en: - Yeah, okay. Cool. - We unbutton a button. Yeah.
translation.ja: 気楽に自由にやろう

translation.en: - All right. - Let's try this. Hit it, Tapes.

translation.en: Me? Yeah!

translation.en: Okay, got it. - You know, feel free to just get loose. - Yep.

translation.en: Okay, um…
translation.ja: えっと…

translation.en: - Quinn, you just gotta dance how you feel. - This is how I feel!

translation.en: All right. Hey, good rehearsal, everybody.

translation.en: Freestyling is about getting out of our heads,

translation.en: and that's what we have to do at qualifiers this weekend.

translation.en: Keep working on it.

translation.en: I'm… gonna go pray.
translation.ja: 天に祈ってくるわ

translation.en: Ever since my interview, I'd been hoping I'd get into Duke early admission,
translation.ja: 大学の早期合格の 通知を待ってた

translation.en: but the night before qualifiers, I got an e- mail saying
translation.ja: 予選の前夜に ついにメールが来た

translation.en: that there would be no decision on my application until the spring.
translation.ja: 予選の前夜に ついにメールが来た “合否は春に”

translation.en: Ms. Ramirez was nice enough to include a personal note. Can't wait to see you dance at Work It!
translation.ja: ラミレスさんの追伸には “ダンス大会が楽しみ”と

translation.en: Yay.
translation.ja: 最高

translation.en: ♪ To stay and give it tonight ♪
translation.ja: “ワーク･イット･ ダンス大会予選”

translation.en: Hello. We signed up online.
translation.ja: 私たち 出場チームです

translation.en: Name?
translation.ja: 名前を

translation.en: TBD.
translation.ja: ＴＢＤ

translation.en: It's just temporary.
translation.ja: 仮称ですけど

translation.en: Changing rooms are in the back.
translation.ja: 裏の更衣室へ

translation.en: Thank you very much.

translation.en: All right. Let's go, guys. Come on.

translation.en: What was that? Yeah, that's a good idea. I'll tell him. You go ahead.

translation.en: Hey, there, again. Uh, group consensus.

translation.en: Our new name is Jasss Quinn.
translation.ja: たった今 名前が決まりました “ジャス･クイン” スペルは…

translation.en: - That is J- A- S- S- S Quinn-- - TBD. Thank you.
translation.ja: “ジャス･クイン” スペルは… ＴＢＤです

translation.en: - Jasss Quinn. -
translation.ja: ＴＢＤです

translation.en: Why do we look like a bunch of dental hygienists?
translation.ja: 歯科衛生士みたい

translation.en: What? They're uniforms. I borrowed them from the nursing home.
translation.ja: 老人ホームの制服よ

translation.en: We look like we're about to go run a blood drive. Remind me to never to put you in charge of costumes ever again.
translation.ja: これじゃ愛の献血だわ 衣装係は変える

translation.en: - Never worn a color before. - For the record, they were free.
translation.ja: 白黒じゃないし タダなのよ

translation.en: Oh… oof.
translation.ja: やれやれ

translation.en: Nice costumes. Scrubs, very appropriate.
translation.ja: 君らにピッタリの衣装だ

translation.en: What are you guys doing here?
translation.ja: なぜ ここに？

translation.en: Yeah, what? Returning champions don't have to qualify.
translation.ja: 予選は免除でしょ

translation.en: Riri's on an Instagram break, so I thought I'd come and watch a train wreck.
translation.ja: 暇だから冷やかしに来た

translation.en: And pretty soon, we're gonna have two things to celebrate.
translation.ja: お祝いごとが増えたわ

translation.en: One being your elimination.
translation.ja: 君らの落選と

translation.en: And Juilliard's auditioning for Juilliard - this weekend. -
translation.ja: ジュリアード音楽院の オーディションも

translation.en: - Trinity, I told you not to say anything. - You literally told me to say that.
translation.ja: 言わないでよ さっき言えって…

translation.en: Anyway, yes, my presence has been requested. I guess they just want to see what all the fuss is about.
translation.ja: 僕の評判を聞いて オーディションに来いって

translation.en: Anyway, break your legs.
translation.ja: まあ頑張って

translation.en: Next up, we have a new dance team from Woodbright High: TBD.
translation.ja: 次はウッドブライト高校の 新チーム ＴＢＤです

translation.en: - Well, this should be interesting. -
translation.ja: お手並み拝見だ

translation.en: - They'll never make it. - No.
translation.ja: 落選だね

translation.en: That was TBD from Woodbright High.
translation.ja: ウッドブライト高校の ＴＢＤでした

translation.en: And now for the judges' scores.
translation.ja: 審査の結果です

translation.en: We have a six, a five, and a five.
translation.ja: ６点　５点　５点

translation.en: Seems a little high for that.
translation.ja: 点が甘いね

translation.en: At least nobody died this time.
translation.ja: 死人は出なかった

translation.en: Five, five, six. Is that good?
translation.ja: あの点数どう？

translation.en: Um, it's between us and the next crew performing, so… if we beat them, then we're in.
translation.ja: あと１チーム残ってるから 次のチームの点数次第よ

translation.en: - Raven are you-- Are you crying? - No!
translation.ja: 泣いてるの？ まさか

translation.en: Oh God, please suck, please suck, please suck. Good luck!

translation.en: Next up from Big Bend High School, please welcome Rock Solid.
translation.ja: 次はビッグ･ベンド高校の ロック･ソリッドです

translation.en: They're really good.
translation.ja: 上手いわ

translation.en: Are-- A- Are you seeing what I'm seeing?
translation.ja: 見間違いじゃないよね

translation.en: Boner.
translation.ja: テントだ

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.ja: まさか 信じられない

translation.en: I think I made direct eye contact.
translation.ja: やだ 目が合った

translation.en: - Wait. He's not wearing a dance belt. - Yeah, no shit, honey.
translation.ja: ダンスベルトは？ してない

translation.en: No, I mean the Work It code of conduct states that all male team member are required
translation.ja: 男子はベルト着用っていう 大会規定があるの

translation.en: - to wear a dance belt during performances. - Wait. So this means…?
translation.ja: 男子はベルト着用っていう 大会規定があるの てことは…

translation.en: It means we're in.
translation.ja: 私たちの勝ち

translation.en: We're in.
translation.ja: 大会進出よ

translation.en: I sucked at qualifiers.
translation.ja: 私はひどいもんだった

translation.en: I'm not kidding. When the judge held up his scorecard, this one was just looking into my soul.
translation.ja: 結果発表の時に 審査員がにらんでたわ

translation.en: - Just directly into my soul. It was bad. - Come on, I'm sure it wasn't that bad.
translation.ja: 私があまりに下手すぎて

translation.en: - You guys made it through, though. - On a technicality.
translation.ja: でも合格だ 棚ボタよ

translation.en: Well, technically, that counts.
translation.ja: 合格は合格だ

translation.en: Maybe you can just hide me in the back for Work It.
translation.ja: 大会では私を隠して

translation.en: I could never hide you in the back.
translation.ja: 隠したりしない

translation.en: Come on. I want to show you this thing Jas told me about.
translation.ja: 見せたいものがあるの

translation.en: So, what did you think?
translation.ja: どうだった？

translation.en: It was amazing.
translation.ja: 感激したよ

translation.en: It was amazing. I just…
translation.ja: すばらしくて…

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: それで？

translation.en: I miss dancing.
translation.ja: ダンスが恋しい

translation.en: So why'd you give it up?
translation.ja: なぜ やめたの？

translation.en: 'Cause I wanted to be the best… and I wasn't any more, so…
translation.ja: １番じゃなくなるのが いやだったんだ

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: すごく上手いのに

translation.en: You're so good. I can't dance at all.
translation.ja: すごく上手いのに 私なんて全然よ

translation.en: That's because you can't learn to dance by reading a book, Quinn.
translation.ja: ダンスは本で学ぶ ものじゃないから

translation.en: Why is Duke so important to you that you would do all of this? I mean, it's just a school.
translation.ja: なぜデューク大に こだわるの？

translation.en: My dad went there.
translation.ja: パパの母校なの

translation.en: He loved it.
translation.ja: 誇りにしてた

translation.en: Like, really, really loved it.
translation.ja: 母校を愛してたわ

translation.en: I don't-- It wasn't always my plan to go. But after he died,
translation.ja: パパが死んでから 同じ大学に行きたくなった

translation.en: I felt like being there would make me connected to him somehow.
translation.ja: 繋がっていられる気がして

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe it sounds stupid.
translation.ja: バカみたい？

translation.en: No, it's not stupid, Quinn.
translation.ja: そんなことないよ

translation.en: Plus, it's close to home.
translation.ja: 家に近いし

translation.en: You know, my mom wouldn't have to be all by herself. And…
translation.ja: ママを一人にしなくてすむ

translation.en: the more that I wanted it, the more that she wanted it.
translation.ja: 次第にママも熱心になって

translation.en: Now she's done everything to help me get this far. I feel like I can't let her down.
translation.ja: 全力で応援してくれた 裏切れないわ

translation.en: So are you doing this for her or for you?
translation.ja: お母さんのため？

translation.en: Honestly, I don't really know.
translation.ja: よく分からない

translation.en: It's just kind of taken on a life of its own now, but… I have to do it.
translation.ja: もう後戻りできないから やるしかないわ

translation.en: I think I know how to fix your freestyle problem.
translation.ja: フリースタイルやろう

translation.en: I wanna try something. Give me your jacket.
translation.ja: いい考えがあるんだ

translation.en: O- Okay.
translation.ja: いいわ

translation.en: I wanna see if you can just… react to what I do.
translation.ja: 僕の動きに 素直に反応してみて

translation.en: Oh, I don't remember signing up for a dance lesson tonight.
translation.ja: レッスンを頼んだ 覚えはないけど

translation.en: You're really gonna turn down a free lesson from the best dancer in the state?
